channel.title: (317) Custom items wiled in wrong place
channel.description:
hey i was wondering if anyone could tell me what im doing wrong because i added a whoole bunch of customs to my client and i go to wiled them and they wield on the wepon thing
like if i wielded a helm it goes to a wepon and the armour looks messed up here is a pic If you can help me or give me advice id appreciate it alot! [img]http://www.blacknscape.info/images/mop/customs.bmp[/img]

item.title: (317) Custom items wiled in wrong place
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

Well, as I see it, you think it is client-side… Well, I can tell you one thing! It’s not client-side, but server-side. Open your item2.java or whatever (item.java?) and search for another bottom id, for example Rune Platelegs ID, and add ur legs id to it, can it be simpler?

Read full topic
